titleStmt.title: Divine poems (by way of paraphrase) on the Ten commandments illustrated with twelve copper plates, shewing how personal punishments has been inflicted on the transgressors of these Commandments, as is recorded in the Holy Scriptures : also a metrical paraphrase upon the Creed and Lords prayer / written by George Wither.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.S., and are to be sold by R. Janeway,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
